trans-unit.source: Provides implicit <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle"></xref> management for child messaging activities.
trans-unit.target: 암시적 제공 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle"> </xref> 자식 메시징 활동에 대 한 관리 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The CorrelationScope activity maintains an implicit <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle> that is only visible to child activities.
trans-unit.target: CorrelationScope 활동 암시적 유지 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle>자식 활동을 표시만 되는.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope.CorrelatesWith%2A> property is set by the user, it will be used as the CorrelationScope implicit handle.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope.CorrelatesWith%2A>속성이 사용자에 의해 설정 되 면 CorrelationScope 암시적 핸들로 사용 됩니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope.CorrelatesWith%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the case of nested CorrelationScope, children of the inner scope cannot access implicit handle of the outer scope.
trans-unit.target: 중첩 된 CorrelationScope의 경우 안쪽 범위에 있는 자식은 바깥쪽 범위의 암시적 핸들을 액세스할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the activity’s execution logic.
trans-unit.target: 작업의 실행 논리를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Builds and validates a description of the activity’s arguments, variables, child activities, and activity delegates.
trans-unit.target: 빌드 및 활동의 인수, 변수, 자식 활동 및 활동 대리자에 대 한 설명을 유효성을 검사 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The activity’s metadata that encapsulates the activity’s arguments, variables, child activities, and activity delegates.
trans-unit.target: 활동의 인수, 변수, 자식 활동 및 활동 대리자를 캡슐화 하는 활동의 메타 데이터입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle"></xref> used by the child messaging activities.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나는 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle"> </xref> 자식 메시징 활동에서 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.

The runtime uses the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A> for correlation if it is present, otherwise the **CorrelatesWith** property of the messaging activity will be used.
trans-unit.target: 런타임에서 사용 하는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A>가 존재 하지 않으면 상관 관계를 위해는 **CorrelatesWith** 메시지 활동의 속성을 사용 합니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both are absent, the ambient handle provided by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> or the workflow service is used.
trans-unit.target: 제공 하는 앰비언트 핸들 두 가지가 모두 없을 경우 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope>또는 워크플로 서비스가 사용 됩니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope>

trans-unit.source: The correlation handle used by the child messaging activities.
trans-unit.target: 자식 메시징 활동에서 사용 하는 상관 관계 핸들입니다.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to execute the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope"></xref> activity.
trans-unit.target: 실행할 워크플로 런타임에 의해 호출 된 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope"> </xref> 활동입니다.

trans-unit.source: The current native activity execution context.
Indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope.CorrelatesWith*> property should be serialized.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope.CorrelatesWith*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope.CorrelatesWith*>고, 그렇지 않으면 직렬화 된 속성 값은 여야 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope.CorrelatesWith*>
